Sanskrit goṇikā + āstīrṇa

tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddh'āvasittassa caturāsītipallaṅkasahassāni ahesuṃ dantamayāni sāramayāni sovaṇṇamayāni goṇak'atthatāni paṭik'atthatāni paṭalik'atthatāni kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇāni sauttaracchadāni ubhatolohitak'ūpadhānāni.

AN 8.11 verañjasuttaṃ

ye'me, bho gotama, puggalā assaddhā jīvik'atthā na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā saṭhā māyāvino ketabino uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā ... na tehi bhavaṃ gotamo saddhiṃ saṃvasati.

cūḷavaggo 1

sabbaṃ taṃ itih'ītihaṃ,
sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ,
n'āhaṃ tattha abhiramiṃ.

gotamīvagga

na jaṭāhi na gottena,
na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo,
yamhi saccañ'ca dhammo ca,
so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo.

DHP 393 brāhmaṇavaggo

yā tā māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sasāmikā saparidaṇḍā antamaso mālāguḷaparikkhittā'pi

AN 10.176 cundasuttaṃ
gotta 2

adj. belonging to a family clan [go] ✗
gottatthaddha

adj. proud of one’s family clan; arrogant about one's ancestry [gotta + thaddha] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning proud of one’s family clan; arrogant about one's ancestry
Construction gotta + thaddha
Compound tatiyā tappurisa (gottena + thaddha)
Commentary (SNPa) jātitthaddho nāma yo, ahaṃ jātisampanno'ti mānaṃ janetvā tena thaddho vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāto hutvā na kassaci onamati. esa nayo dhanagottatthaddhesu.
Sanskrit gotra + stabdha

jātitthaddho dhanatthaddho,
gottatthaddho ca yo naro,
saññātiṃ atimaññeti,
taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.

SNP 6 parābhavasuttaṃ

khattiyo seṭṭho janetasmiṃ,
ye gottapaṭisārino,
vijjācaraṇasampanno,
so seṭṭho devamānuse'ti.

VIN 1.1.2 dutiyapārājikaṃ
gopa

masc. cowherd; herdsman; cattle guard [√gup + *a] ✓

Grammar masc
Meaning cowherd; herdsman; cattle guard
Root Family √gup
Root √gup･1 a (guard)
Construction √gup > gop + *a
Derivative kita (*a)
Phonetic Change u > o
Commentary (SNPa) gunnaṃ pālanato gopo. yo hi attano gāvo pāleti, so gopo'ti vuccati. yo paresaṃ vetanena bhaṭo hutvā, so gopālako.
Notes or go + pa
Sanskrit gopa
Sanskrit Root √gup 1 (protect)

bahum'pi ce sahitaṃ bhāsamāno,
na takkaro hoti naro pamatto,
gopo'va gāvo gaṇayaṃ paresaṃ,
na bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.

Compound kammadhāraya (gopada + matta)
Sanskrit gopada + mātra

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante tattha tattha gopadesu udakāni ṭhitāni honti, evam'evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tattha tattha gopadamattāni mahāsamudde udakāni ṭhitāni honti. pañcamassa, bhikkhave, sūriyassa pātubhāvā aṅgulipabbamattam'pi mahāsamudde udakaṃ na hoti.

AN 7.66 sattasūriyasuttaṃ
gopanatthāya

ind. to protect (it); lit. for the sake of guarding [gopana + attha + āya] ~

Grammar ind, adv, comp
Meaning to protect (it); lit. for the sake of guarding
Construction gopana + attha + āya
gopanattha + āya
gopayanta

prp. (+acc) guarding; watching; protecting [√gup + *aya + nta] ✓

Grammar prp of gopayati, caus, trans (+acc)
Meaning guarding; watching; protecting
Root Family √gup
Root √gup･1 *aya (guard)
Base √gup + *aya > gopaya (caus)
Construction gopaya + nta
Derivative kita (nta)
Phonetic Change u > o
Sanskrit gopayat
Sanskrit Root √gup 1 (protect)

tassa evaṃ ārakkhato gopayato te bhoge rājāno vā haranti, corā vā haranti, aggi vā dahati, udakaṃ vā vahati, appiyā vā dāy'ādā haranti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati, yam'pi me ahosi tam'pi no n'atthī'ti.

MN 13 mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ
gopariṇāyaka

masc. leader of the cattle; leader of the herd [go + pariṇāyaka] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning leader of the cattle; leader of the herd
Construction go + pariṇāyaka
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (gunnaṃ + pariṇāyaka)
Commentary (ANa) gāvo pariṇāyanti yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantī'ti gopariṇāyakā.
Sanskrit go + pariṇāyaka

idha, bhikkhave, gopālako ... na dhūmaṃ kattā hoti, na titthaṃ jānāti, na pītaṃ jānāti, na vīthiṃ jānāti, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohī ca hoti, ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.

AN 11.17 gopālasuttaṃ

so paṭhamaṃ patāresi ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā. te tiriyaṃ gaṅgāya sotaṃ chetvā sotthinā pāraṃ agamaṃsu. ath'āpare patāresi balavagāvo dammagāvo.

MN 34 cūḷagopālakasuttaṃ
gopasū

masc. cattle and other domestic animals ✗
gopāṇasī

fem. beam; rafter; wooden framework of a thatch roof ✓

Grammar fem
Meaning beam; rafter; wooden framework of a thatch roof
Variant gopānasī
Commentary (MNa) jarasālāya gopānasiyo'ti jiṇṇasālāya gopānasiyo
Sanskrit gopānasī

seyyathā'pi nāma jarasālāya gopāṇasiyo oluggaviluggā bhavanti, evam'ev'assu me phāsuḷiyo oluggaviluggā bhavanti tāy'ev'app'āhāratāya.

MN 36 mahāsaccakasuttaṃ
gopānasivaṅka

adj. as crooked as a rafter [gopānasī + vaṅka] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning as crooked as a rafter
Construction gopānasī + vaṅka
Compound kammadhāraya (gopānasī viya vaṅka)
Commentary (MNa) gopānasivaṅkan'ti gopānasī viya vaṅkaṃ.
Sanskrit gopānasī + vaṅka

idha, bhikkhave, tam'eva bhaginiṃ passeyya aparena samayena āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā vassasatikaṃ vā jātiyā, jiṇṇaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ bhoggaṃ daṇḍaparāyanaṃ pavedhamānaṃ gacchantiṃ āturaṃ gatayobbanaṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ, vilūnaṃ khalitasiraṃ valinaṃ tilak'āhatagattaṃ.

gopānasī

Meaning beam; rafter; wooden framework of a thatch roof
Variant gopāṇasī
Sanskrit gopānasī

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, kūṭ'āgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅ'gamā kūṭaninnā kūṭasamosaraṇā, kūṭaṃ tāsaṃ aggam'akkhāyati

SN 22.102 aniccasaññāsuttaṃ
gopāla 1

masc. cowherd; cowboy; lit. cow guard [go + pāla] ✓

Grammar masc, agent, comp
Meaning cowherd; cowboy; lit. cow guard
Construction go + pāla
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (gunnaṃ + pāla)
Commentary (SNPa) gunnaṃ pālanato gopo. yo hi attano gāvo pāleti, so gopo'ti vuccati. yo paresaṃ vetanena bhaṭo hutvā, so gopālako.
Sanskrit gopāla

yathā daṇḍena gopālo,
gāvo pājeti gocaraṃ,
evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca,
āyuṃ pājenti pāṇinaṃ.

Commentary (SNPa) gunnaṃ pālanato gopo. yo hi attano gāvo pāleti, so gopo'ti vuccati. yo paresaṃ vetanena bhaṭo hutvā, so gopālako.
Sanskrit gopālaka

gopālako sāyanhasamaye sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati, ajja kho gāvo amukasmiñ'ca amukasmiñ'ca padese cariṃsu

AN 3.71 uposathasuttaṃ

ekādasahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṃ pariharituṃ phātiṃ kātuṃ. katamehi ekādasahi?

so n'ātidūre pādaṃ uddharati, n'āccāsanne pādaṃ nikkhipati, so n'ātisīghaṃ gacchati, n'ātisaṇikaṃ gacchati, na ca adduvena adduvaṃ saṅghaṭṭento gacchati, na ca gopphakena gopphakaṃ saṅghaṭṭento gacchati.

MN 91 brahmāyusuttaṃ

aññena hatth'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena pād'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena gopphak'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena jaṅgh'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena ūru'ṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṭi'ṭṭhikaṃ aññena phāsuk'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhi'ṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandh'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena gīv'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena hanuk'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena dant'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ

DN 22.7 mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ

Meaning ankle bone
Construction gopphaka + aṭṭhika
Compound kammadhāraya (gopphaka + aṭṭhika)
Sanskrit gulpha + asthika

puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathā'pi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhikāni apagatasambandhāni disā vidisā vikkhittāni, aññena hatth'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena pād'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena gopphak'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena jaṅgh'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena ūru'ṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṭi'ṭṭhikaṃ aññena phāsuk'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhi'ṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandh'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena gīv'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena hanuk'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena dant'aṭṭhikaṃ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ.

hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṃ mahāsamudde aḍḍhaporisam'pi udakaṃ saṇṭhāti, kaṭimattam'pi udakaṃ saṇṭhāti, jāṇukamattam'pi udakaṃ saṇṭhāti, gopphakamattam'pi udakaṃ saṇṭhāti.

nandati puttehi puttimā,
gomā gohi tath'eva nandati,
upadhīhi narassa nandanā,
na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhī'ti.

socati puttehi puttimā,
gomā gohi tath'eva socati,
upadhīhi narassa socanā,
na hi so socati yo nirūpadhī'ti.

SN 1.12 nandatisuttaṃ
gomaya

nt. cowdung; cowpat; lit. made of cow [go + maya] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning cowdung; cowpat; lit. made of cow
Construction go + maya
Commentary (ANa) gomayan'ti gomuttaṃ vā ajalaṇḍikā vā.
Sanskrit gomaya

atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gahetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca. ettako'pi kho, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho n'atthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassati.

SN 22.96 gomayapiṇḍasuttaṃ

so tattha allāni c'eva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, allāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, allāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya, udakavātañ'ca dadeyya, paṃsukena ca okireyya.

SN 46.53 aggisuttaṃ

Sanskrit gomaya + gandha

kiñ'c'āpi taṃ hoti vatthaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ, atha khv'assa hoti yeva anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato. tam'enaṃ rajako sāmikānaṃ deti.

Meaning cowdung fire

seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, yaṃ yadeva paccayaṃ paṭicca aggi jalati tena ten'eva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati ... tiṇañ'ca paṭicca aggi jalati, tiṇ'aggitv'eva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, gomayañ'ca paṭicca aggi jalati, gomay'aggitv'eva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati

Sanskrit gomaya + piṇḍa

atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gahetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca, ettako'pi kho, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho n'atthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassati.

SN 22.96 gomayapiṇḍasuttaṃ
gomayapiṇḍasutta

nt. Saṃyutta Nikāya 22.96 (SN22.96) ✗
gomayabhakkha

adj. feeding on cowdung [gomaya + bhakkha] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning feeding on cowdung
Construction gomaya + bhakkha
Compound dutiyā tappurisa (gomayaṃ + bhakkha)
Sanskrit gomaya + bhakṣa

so sākabhakkho'pi hoti sāmākabhakkho'pi hoti nīvārabhakkho'pi hoti daddulabhakkho'pi hoti haṭabhakkho'pi hoti kaṇabhakkho'pi hoti ācāmabhakkho'pi hoti piññākabhakkho'pi hoti tiṇabhakkho'pi hoti gomayabhakkho'pi hoti, vanamūlaphal'āhāro'pi yāpeti pavattaphalabhojī.

AN 4.198 attantapasuttaṃ

te tattha sākabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, sāmākabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, nīvārabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, daddulabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, haṭabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, kaṇabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, ācāmabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, piññākabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, tiṇabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, gomayabhakkhā'pi ahesuṃ, vanamūlaphal'āhārā yāpesuṃ pavattaphalabhojī.

MIL 4.3.7 buddhapūjanapañho
gorasa

masc. dairy product; lit. cow taste [go + rasa] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning dairy product; lit. cow taste
Construction go + rasa
Notes pañcagorasa 1. khīraṃ, 2. dadhiṃ, 3. takkaṃ, 4. navanītaṃ, 5. sappiṃ
Sanskrit gorasa
golakkhaṇa

nt. auspicious marks of cows ✗
goliyāni

masc. name of a monk ✗
goliyānisutta

nt. Majjhima Nikāya 69 (MN69) ✗
golissāni

masc. name of a monk ✗
golomi

nt. type of a beard ✗
golomī

fem. orris root ✗
govajjha

masc. cow for the slaughter; lit. cow to be killed [go + vajjha] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning cow for the slaughter; lit. cow to be killed
Construction go + vajjha
Compound kammadhāraya (go + vajjha)
Variant gāvīvajjha
Commentary (NIDD1a) ekam'eko'va maccānaṃ, govajjho viya niyyatī'ti sattānaṃ ekam'eko vadhāya niyyamānagoṇo viya maraṇāya niyyati pāpuṇīyati.
Sanskrit go + vadhya

seyyathā'pi, brāhmaṇa, gāvī vajjhā āghātanaṃ nīyamānā yaṃ yadeva pādaṃ uddharati, santikeva hoti vadhassa santikeva maraṇassa, evamevaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, govajjh'ūpamaṃ jīvitaṃ manussānaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ bahudukkhaṃ bah'upāyāsaṃ mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, n'atthi jātassa amaraṇan'ti.

AN 7.74 arakasuttaṃ
govajjhūpama

adj. like a cow for the slaughter; lit. like a cow to be killed [govajjha + upama] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning like a cow for the slaughter; lit. like a cow to be killed
Construction govajjha + upama
Compound kammadhāraya (govajjha + upama)
Variant gāvīvajjhūpama
Sanskrit go + vadhya + upamā

seyyathā'pi, brāhmaṇa, gāvī vajjhā āghātanaṃ nīyamānā yaṃ yadeva pādaṃ uddharati, santik'eva hoti vadhassa santik'eva maraṇassa, evam'evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, govajjh'ūpamaṃ jīvitaṃ manussānaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ bahudukkhaṃ bah'upāyāsaṃ mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, n'atthi jātassa amaraṇan'ti.

AN 7.74 arakasuttaṃ
govata

nt. ascetic practice of behaving like a cow [go + vata] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning ascetic practice of behaving like a cow
Construction go + vata
Compound kammadhāraya (go + vata)
Sanskrit govrata

tatiyam'pi kho acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca, ayaṃ, bhante, puṇṇo koliyaputto govatiko. tassa taṃ govataṃ dīgharattaṃ samattaṃ samādinnaṃ. tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo'ti?

MN 57 kukkuravatikasuttaṃ
govatika

adj. performing the ascetic practice of behaving like a cow [go + vatika] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning performing the ascetic practice of behaving like a cow
Construction go + vatika
Compound kammadhāraya (go + vatika)
Commentary (MNa) govatiko'ti samādinnagovato, sīse siṅgāni ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ bandhitvā gāvīhi saddhiṃ tiṇāni khādanto viya carati.
Sanskrit govrata +

atha kho puṇṇo ca koliyaputto govatiko acelo ca seniyo kukkuravatiko yena bhagavā ten'upasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā puṇṇo koliyaputto govatiko bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekam'antaṃ nisīdi.

MN 57 kukkuravatikasuttaṃ
govikattana

nt. butcher’s knife; lit. cow cutting [go + vikattana] ~

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning butcher’s knife; lit. cow cutting
Construction go + vikattana
Compound kammadhāraya (go + vikattana)
Sanskrit go + vikartana (bsk)
govikantana

nt. butcher’s knife; lit. cow cutting [go + vikantana] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning butcher’s knife; lit. cow cutting
Construction go + vikantana
Compound kammadhāraya (go + vikantana)
Sanskrit go + vikartana (bsk)

seyyathā'pi, āvuso, dakkho goghātako vā goghātak'antevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṃ parikanteyya, evam'eva kho adhimattā vātā kucchiṃ parikantanti.

SN 35.87 channasuttaṃ
govinda

masc. name of a Brahman; lit. cow finder; (or) lord of the cows [go + vinda (or)] ~

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning name of a Brahman; lit. cow finder; (or) lord of the cows
Construction go + vinda (or)
go + [v] + inda
Commentary (APt) govindo, gavaṃ indo govindo, gavaṃ vindatī'ti vā govindo
Sanskrit govinda
govindabrāhmaṇavatthu

nt. the story of the Brahman Govinda [govinda + brāhmaṇa + vatthu] ~

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning the story of the Brahman Govinda
Construction govinda + brāhmaṇa + vatthu
govindiya

nt. Govinda's position [go + vinda + iya] ~

Grammar nt, abstr, comp
Meaning Govinda's position
Construction go + vinda + iya
govinda + iya
Derivative taddhita (iya)
gosappi

nt. cow ghee [go + sappi] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning cow ghee
Construction go + sappi
Compound kammadhāraya (go + sappi)
Sanskrit go + sarpis

sappi nāma gosappi vā ajikāsappi vā mahiṃsasappi vā yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati tesaṃ sappi.

VIN 1.4.3.3 bhesajjasikkhāpadaṃ
gosamita

adj. like cattle; equal to cows [go + samita] ✓

Grammar adj, comp
Meaning like cattle; equal to cows
Construction go + samita
Compound kammadhāraya (go + samita)
Commentary (SNa) gosamitaṃ dhanan'ti gohi samaṃ godhanasamaṃ godhanasadisaṃ aññaṃ dhanaṃ nāma n'atthi bhagavā'ti āha.
Sanskrit go + samita

n'atthi puttasamaṃ pemaṃ,
n'atthi gosamitaṃ dhanaṃ,
n'atthi sūriyasamā ābhā,
samuddaparamā sarā'ti.

SN 1.13 natthiputtasamasuttaṃ
gosāla

masc. family name of a ascetic teacher; Makkhali Gosāla; lit. from a cow shed [go + sālā + a] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning family name of a ascetic teacher; Makkhali Gosāla; lit. from a cow shed
Construction go + sālā + a
gosālā + a
Derivative taddhita (a)
Commentary (SNa) so pana gosālāya jātattā gosālo'ti vutto.
Sanskrit gośāla

atha kho sahali devaputto makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi

SN 2.30 nānātitthiyasāvakasuttaṃ

ayam'pi kho makkhali gosālo saṅghī c'eva gaṇī ca gaṇ'ācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.

SN 44.9 kutūhalasālāsuttaṃ
gosālattheragāthā

fem. Theragāthā 23 (TH23) ✗
gosiṅga

masc. cow horn [go + siṅga] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning cow horn
Construction go + siṅga
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (gāvassa + siṅga)
Sanskrit gośṛṅga

evaṃ me sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjak'āvasathe. tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharanti.

MN 31 cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ
gosiṅgasālavana

nt. name of a monastery; lit. cow horn sal tree forest [gosiṅga + sālavana] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning name of a monastery; lit. cow horn sal tree forest
Construction gosiṅga + sālavana
Compound kammadhāraya (gosiṅga + sālavana)
Commentary (MNa) gosiṅgasālavanadāye'ti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi, taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbam'pi taṃ vanaṃ gosiṅgasālavanan'ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
Sanskrit gośṛṅga + śāla + vana

ramaṇīyaṃ, āvuso ānanda, gosiṅgasālavanaṃ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti, kathaṃrūpena, āvuso ānanda, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyā'ti?

MN 32 mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ
gosiṅgasālavanadāya

masc. name of a monastery; lit. cow-horn sal tree forest monastery [gosiṅga + sālavana + dāya] ✓

Grammar masc, comp
Meaning name of a monastery; lit. cow-horn sal tree forest monastery
Construction gosiṅga + sālavana + dāya
Compound kammadhāraya (gosiṅgasālavana + dāya)
Commentary (MNa) gosiṅgasālavanadāye'ti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi, taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbam'pi taṃ vanaṃ gosiṅgasālavanan'ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. dāyo'ti avisesena araññass'etaṃ nāmaṃ. tasmā gosiṅgasālavanadāye'ti gosiṅgasālavan'āraññe'ti attho.
Sanskrit gośṛṅga + śāla + vana + dāva

evaṃ me sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjak'āvasathe. tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharanti.

MN 31 cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ
gosīla

nt. conduct of a cow; cow's behaviour [go + sīla] ✓

Grammar nt, comp
Meaning conduct of a cow; cow's behaviour
Construction go + sīla
Compound chaṭṭhī tappurisa (gāvassa + sīla)
Sanskrit go + śīla

so govataṃ bhāvetvā paripuṇṇaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ, gosīlaṃ bhāvetvā paripuṇṇaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ, gocittaṃ bhāvetvā paripuṇṇaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ, gav'ākappaṃ bhāvetvā paripuṇṇaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gunnaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.

MN 57 kukkuravatikasuttaṃ
gohanuka

masc. cow's jaw bone ✗

Construction go > gv + ākappa

Variant gavākappa

gāmaṃ + api + ahaṃ
gāmaṇḍalaṃva

gāmaṇḍalaṃ + eva
gāmaṇḍalaṃ + iva
gāmesupi

gāmesu + api
gāmikasahassesu

gāmika + sahassesu
gāmikasahassānaṃ

gāmika + sahassānaṃ
gāmikasahassāni

gāmika + sahassāni
gāmopi

gāmo + api
gāmoti

gāmo + iti
gāmāpi

gāma + api
gāmā + api
gāme + api
gāmūpacārañca

gāmūpacāraṃ + ca
gāravañca

gāravaṃ + ca
gāravoti

gāravo + iti
gāthanti

gāthaṃ + iti
gāthācimā

gāthā + ca + imā
gāthādukanipātamhi

gāthā + dukanipātamhi
gāthādvayaṃ

gāthā + dvayaṃ
gātha + advayaṃ
gāthā + advayaṃ
gāthānamuddānaṃ

gāthānaṃ + uddānaṃ
gāthāna + muddānaṃ
gāthānamāsayoti

gāthānamāsayo + iti
gāthāsatāni

gāthā + satāni
gāthāsaṅkhyā

gāthā + saṅkhyā
gāthāti

gātha + iti
gāthā + iti
gāthātipadassa

gāthā + iti + padassa
gāthā + tipadassa
gāthāyopi

gāthāyo + api
gāthāyoyeva

gāthāyo + eva
gāthāyuddānaṃ

gāthāya + uddānaṃ
gāthā + uddānaṃ
gāvimpi

gāvi + api
gāviṃ + api
gāvoti

gāvo + iti
gāyantipi

gāyanti + api
gāyantiyāpi

gāyantiyā + api

gāyantīpi

gāyantī + api

gāyanti + iti

gāyati + iti
gāyatī + iti

gītampi

gīta + api

gīveyyakaṃ + api

gīvā + api

gīvāyaṃ + api
gūthagatampi

gūthagata + api
gūthagataṃ + api
gūthalittaṃva

gūtha + littaṃ + eva
gūtha + littaṃ + iva

gūtha + alittaṃ + iva
